creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: 3/4 bust of male figure with long hair, glasses, and a long goatee; image area is circular
inscription:
Signature, Inscription

-- inscribed in plate at bottom: [Imp. Aug. Delâtre R. de la Bucherie 6]
-- in graphite on verso: 253 3rd etat | 559052
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold March 4, 1992, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in plate, lower left: [CH Jacque]
title: Head of a Man
